messages.content: All right, please. Explain to me what's going on, okay?
There's a note left and our daughter's gone.
A note was left and your daughter is gone?
Yes, she's six years old. She's gone.
I don't know. I just found the note.
Does it say who took her?
There's a ransom note here. It says S-B-T-C. Victory.
Patsy Ramsey. I'm the mother. Oh my God.
I'm sending an officer over, okay? Do you know how long she's been gone?
No, I don't. Please, we just got up and she's not here. Oh my God, please.
Okay, try to stay calm. Help is on the way.
